TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi D3DImage extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource

summary.span: 顯示使用者建立之 Direct3D 介面的 。

span.span: An that displays a user-created Direct3D surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用Direct3D 內容，在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中裝載的類別。Use the class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 呼叫方法，以變更所顯示的 Direct3D 內容。Call the method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the . 呼叫Direct3D 介面，以將指派方法。Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to a . 呼叫方法，以追蹤 Direct3D 介面的更新。Call the method to track updates to the Direct3D surface. 呼叫方法，以顯示已變更的區域。Call the method to display the changed areas. 類別會管理兩個顯示緩衝區，稱為*背景緩衝區*和*前端緩衝區*。The class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*. 背景緩衝區是 Direct3D 介面。The back buffer is your Direct3D surface. 變更背景緩衝區會複製轉寄至前端緩衝區當您呼叫方法，它會顯示在硬體。Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the method, where it is displayed on the hardware. 有時候，前端緩衝區變成無法使用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 這種欠缺可用性可能因鎖定畫面、 全螢幕獨佔 Direct3D 應用程式、 切換使用者，或其他系統活動。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 當發生這種情況時，WPF 應用程式就會通知處理事件。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 您的應用程式回應變得無法使用前端緩衝區的方式取決於是否啟用 WPF 改為使用軟體呈現。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法具有可接受的參數會指定是否 WPF 退回使用軟體呈現多載。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. ## 當 WPF 不會回到軟體呈現無法使用的前端緩衝區回應Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering 當您呼叫多載，或呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，呈現系統釋放背景緩衝區的參考，當前端緩衝區變成無法使用，而且執行任何動作顯示。When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 轉譯系統前端緩衝區再次可用時，會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立事件處理常式轉譯使用有效的 Direct3D 介面，然後再次重新啟動的事件。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . ## 當 WPF 改回軟體呈現無法使用的前端緩衝區回應Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering 當您呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`true`，呈現系統會保留其背景緩衝區的參考時前端緩衝區變成無法使用，因此不需要呼叫時最上層緩衝區恢復可用性為止。When you call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能有一些情況，使用者的裝置會變成無法使用。There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable. 當發生此情況時，呼叫釋放 WPF 的背景緩衝區的參考。When that occurs, call to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer. 如果您要重設您的裝置，請呼叫與`backBuffer`參數設定為`null`，然後呼叫再次`backBuffer`設為有效的 Direct3D 介面。If you need to reset your device, call with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. > [!NOTE] > 效能大幅定 Direct3D 介面的設定。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互通性的效能考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別不會顯示 Direct3D 內容時 WPF 軟體中呈現，例如透過遠端桌面連線，除非您呼叫並指定`true`如`enableSoftwareFallback`參數。The class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告在 XAML 中。The following code example shows how to declare a in XAML. 您必須將對應命名空間，因為它不會包含預設 XAML 命名空間中。You must map the namespace, because it is not included in the default XAML namespaces. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml#10)]

summary.span: 指定所變更之背景緩衝區的區域。

span.span: Specifies the area of the back buffer that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以表示您的程式碼具有背景緩衝區所做的變更。Call the method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer. 若要呈現，在背景緩衝區的已變更的區域必須擁有對應的已變更的區域。To be rendered, the changed area on the back buffer must have a corresponding changed area on the . 呼叫和方法呼叫之前方法。Call the and methods before calling the method. 呼叫方法，以將已變更的區域複製到前端的緩衝區。Call the method to copy the changed areas to the front buffer. > [!NOTE] > 後幾個呼叫方法，這個方法已變更的區域會合併成單一區域。After a few calls to the method, the changed areas are merged into a single area. 這表示您必須擁有有效的資料已變更區域外部。This means you must have valid data outside of the changed areas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以指定的已變更的區域背景緩衝區中。The following code example shows how to call the method to specify the changed region in the back buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由用戶端列印系統如呼叫和類別。The method is called by clients such as the printing system and the class. 選擇性地覆寫方法來實作自訂邏輯，並傳回不同。Optionally override the method to implement custom logic and return a different . 例如，您還可以傳回預留位置如果預設實作會傳回`null`。For example, you can return a placeholder if the default implementation returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您是衍生自類別，您必須覆寫方法，以便能夠正確複製。If you derive from the class, you must override the method to enable correct cloning. 預設實作會執行`return new D3DImage()`，這不會在不同的類別執行個體是否正確。The default implementation performs a `return new D3DImage()`, which will not be correct if the instance is a different class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋出資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 。

span.span: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候，前端緩衝區變成無法使用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 這種欠缺可用性可能因鎖定畫面、 全螢幕獨佔 Direct3D 應用程式、 切換使用者，或其他系統活動。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 當發生這種情況時，WPF 應用程式就會通知處理事件。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 您的應用程式回應變得無法使用前端緩衝區的方式取決於是否啟用 WPF 改為使用軟體呈現。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法具有可接受的參數會指定是否 WPF 退回使用軟體呈現多載。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 備註 」 中的類別。For more information, see the remarks in the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查轉譯組合目標時的屬性。The following code example shows how to check the property when rendering the composition target. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理前端緩衝區的狀態變更時收到通知。Handle the to be notified when the status of the front buffer changes. 您的應用程式回應變得無法使用前端緩衝區的方式取決於是否啟用 WPF 改為使用軟體呈現。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法具有可接受的參數會指定是否 WPF 退回使用軟體呈現多載。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 備註 」 中的類別。For more information, see the remarks in the class.

summary.span: 鎖定 ，並且在背景緩衝區上啟用操作。

span.span: Locks the and enables operations on the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法呼叫來變更背景緩衝區和方法。Call the method to change the back buffer by calling the and methods. 雖然已鎖定，您的應用程式也可以轉譯至指派給背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面。While the is locked, your application can also render to the Direct3D surface assigned to the back buffer. > [!NOTE] > 方法會封鎖，當呈現系統正在讀取背景緩衝區來更新前端的緩衝區。The method blocks when the rendering system is reading the back buffer to update the front buffer. 使用方法，以避免無限期地封鎖。Use the method to avoid blocking indefinitely. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以啟用背景緩衝區的更新。The following code example shows how to call the method to enable updates to the back buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBackBuffer (System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, IntPtr backBuffer);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBackBuffer(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, native int backBuffer) cil managed
Public Sub SetBackBuffer (backBufferType As D3DResourceType, backBuffer As IntPtr)

span.span: The type of Direct3D surface.
Must be a valid .

param.name: backBuffer
param.span: 指派要做為背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面。

span.span: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.

summary.span: 指派 Direct3D 介面做為背景緩衝區的來源。

span.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫將指派給背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面方法。Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to the back buffer. > [!NOTE] > 效能大幅定 Direct3D 介面的設定。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互通性的效能考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). 呼叫多載等同於呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`。Calling the overload is identical to calling the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`. 當您呼叫或呼叫與`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，當前端緩衝區變成無法使用，並不會顯示呈現系統釋出背景緩衝區的參考。When you call or call with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 轉譯系統前端緩衝區再次可用時，會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立事件處理常式轉譯使用有效的 Direct3D 介面，然後再次重新啟動的事件。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . 下表列出必要的背景緩衝區設定`IDirect3DSurface9`型別。The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type. - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 允許多重採樣`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`只呈現。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫指派 Direct3D 介面的方法。The following code example shows how to call the method to assign a Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBackBuffer (System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, IntPtr backBuffer, bool enableSoftwareFallback);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBackBuffer(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, native int backBuffer, bool enableSoftwareFallback) cil managed
Public Sub SetBackBuffer (backBufferType As D3DResourceType, backBuffer As IntPtr, enableSoftwareFallback As Boolean)
public: void SetBackBuffer(System::Windows::Interop::D3DResourceType backBufferType, IntPtr backBuffer, bool enableSoftwareFallback);

span.span: The type of Direct3D surface.
Must be a valid .

param.name: backBuffer
param.span: 指派要做為背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面。

span.span: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.

param.name: enableSoftwareFallback
param.span: 表示要回到軟體轉譯，否則為 。

span.span: to fall back on software rendering; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指派 Direct3D 介面做為背景緩衝區的來源。

span.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫多載，或呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，呈現系統釋放背景緩衝區的參考，當前端緩衝區變成無法使用，而且執行任何動作顯示。When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 轉譯系統前端緩衝區再次可用時，會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立事件處理常式轉譯使用有效的 Direct3D 介面，然後再次重新啟動的事件。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . 當您呼叫與`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`true`，呈現系統會保留其背景緩衝區的參考時前端緩衝區變成無法使用，因此不需要呼叫前端緩衝區時使用一次。When you call with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能有一些情況，使用者的裝置會變成無法使用。There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable. 當發生此情況時，呼叫釋放 WPF 的背景緩衝區的參考。When that occurs, call to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer. 如果您要重設您的裝置，請呼叫與`backBuffer`設`null`，然後呼叫再次`backBuffer`設為有效的 Direct3D 介面。If you need to reset your device, call with `backBuffer` set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. 下表列出必要的背景緩衝區設定`IDirect3DSurface9`型別。The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type. - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 允許多重採樣`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`只呈現。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Unlock() cil managed

summary.span: 遞減 的鎖定計數。

span.span: Decrements the lock count for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當鎖定計數為到達零時，已完全解除鎖定。When the lock count for the reaches zero, the is fully unlocked. 標示為進行呈現，如果映像已變更先前呼叫所指定的區域方法。The is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the method. 當在認可變更，並轉譯，就會發生，其他呼叫方法封鎖，直到呈現執行緒已複製到前端的緩衝區的背景緩衝區的內容。When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer. 此同步處理可避免顯示成品，例如分裂。This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing. > [!NOTE] > 無法更新時的 Direct3D 介面已解除鎖定。Do not update the Direct3D surface while the is unlocked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以將更新的背景緩衝區複製到前端的緩衝區。The following code example shows how to call the method to copy the updated back buffer to the front buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值指派新的背景緩衝區的呼叫時，可以變更方法。The value of can change when a new back buffer is assigned by a call to the method.
